title: 2024 is VR's Most Important Year Yet
description:
Hello and welcome to TUESDAY (wednesday) NEWSDAY! Your number one resource for the entire week's worth of VR news! WE GOT A BIG ONE THIS WEEK! Happy new year everyone.. buckle up for 2024. 
The Apple Vision Pro has received a release date, Sony announces a new VR headset, Google and Samsung are working on something with Qualcomm and their new chipset and Shiftall announces a new tiny device to compete with the BigScreen beyond.

Oh.. AND PCVR just got about 10,000 new games via a mod. Nice. 

Join in my discord!
Discord.gg/Thrill

Support My Content:
Patreon.com/Thrillseeker

 Timestamps
00:00 Intro
01:11 Sony's new headset
03:40 Qualcomm's new processor
04:47 Vision Pro
07:03 Spatial Computing
08:21 10,000 plus games come to VR
13:13 New Tiny VR Headset
14:42 Outro
